to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "石川湧馬"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "09041209240"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "yuma.fuu05@gmail.com"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "yuma.ishikawa@knowledgework.com"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "ありがとうございます！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "okです！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "レビューおねがいします🙏"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "よろしくお願いします！"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "承知しました🫡"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "【】"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

set_notification_message.text:
g: https://github.com
z: https://zenn.dev
x: https://x.com
y: https://youtube.com
l: https://lms.keio.jp
s: https://scrapbox.io/yumamemo

p: pick-color
c: open-camera
e: search-emoji-symbols
spacebar: confetti

rules.description: コロンとセミコロンを入れ替える
left_controlで英数字モードに変更
caps_lockで英数字モードに変更
right_optionで日本語モードに変更
